Html:
Hi... I have the problem with mi project... I was developing my project on another computer and I copy the project in my laptop when I get the following error:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/10162364/Error%20C%23.jpg

I use FrameWork 4 and C# with Visual Study 2010

Thank you.

Radioman thank you very much for your answer but it was not the solution ... I try as many things as re-install the DLL's of the maps but still does not work. I require Please fix this issue soon, I do not understand because it gives me this problem on laptop and mi PC of the company works well.

Thank You.
